website_summaries.verdict: A very good light-duty breaker bar for around-the-shop tasks, but it won’t hold up to heavier jobs.
pros: Well-built with little tendency to bend after heavy use
Reaches easily into wheel wells to loosen brake calipers
Handles lug nuts and trailer hitch bolts with ease
cons: Smooth grip makes it difficult for some to use
Swivel head likely won’t hold up to heavier uses over 350 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Makes light work of tough jobs!
customer_reviews.text: This makes tough work easy, almost too easy...but I really can't complain about that. I used this for a brake job on a 2003 Dodge Grand Caravan and I had no difficulty using it to remove lug nuts, to remove the calipers, and honestly I love how much of an easier time I had compared to a normal tire iron. The only thing to watch out for is to not over-tighten your lug nuts as this can make a normal strength individual easily capable of over-tightening. On a side note, you also feel safer when using it as it would also double well as a self-defense item.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Savage

customer_reviews.title: My TF2 weapon of choice, also for my car
customer_reviews.text: This breaker bar is very durable and makes it very easy to break the tension on those rusted on tighter bolts. It also does a good job getting tire lugs and such back on to the right torque with little effort. it looks like it will actually last for a very long time and lots of pulling. Great bar, also has zero play or slack when moving it back and forth
customer_reviews.author: HeartStrike

customer_reviews.title: Leverage soo much herrre
customer_reviews.text: Some bolts require a breaker bar at work, my foreman got a breaker bar from a tool truck🤑🙃. Paid hundreds, I showed him this, told him next time we need a breaker bar let's use mines... BUDDY was BLOWN AWAY, first time using! Have had mines now few weeks , have HAD too use numerous TIMES! Great product, great price, definitely would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: The breaker bar was bowed so bad that if I attatched a string to it I would have been able to shoot arrows. I returned it the same day I received it. Absolutely no excuse to ship an item so deformed to a customer.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This massive breaker bar is an excellent addition to my collection of tools for the inevitable ...
customer_reviews.text: This massive breaker bar is an excellent addition to my collection of tools for the inevitable repair of a 2000 Honda. It holds up well and offers enough leverage for most applications. Even better, it is long enough to reach outside the wheel well to allow for an additional pipe without sacrificing precious angles for consistent torque on even the most stubborn axle nut.
customer_reviews.author: Chris flynn

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Took
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good long breaker bar as my car's wheel nuts torque to 100 foot pounds. Got the socket elsewhere. 1/2" drive handles larger deep socket well.
customer_reviews.author: Agent999

customer_reviews.title: Use these for loosening the oil filters on Toyotas at ...
customer_reviews.text: Use these for loosening the oil filters on Toyotas at work. Comes very handy at times when it doesn't want to budge off.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Boy

customer_reviews.title: Good size and strength for the price
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this size. The leverage is awesome as it released bolts in one try that I could not get to budge in two weekends. I got the wrong size as my tools are for 3/8 drive but got the adaptor at a local store and problem solved. That was my mistake. Great buy and price.
customer_reviews.author: Jozzzer

customer_reviews.title: Best breaker bar
customer_reviews.text: No problem breaking the lug nuts, and makes it quick and easy to go from winter to summer wheels, and vice versa
customer_reviews.author: VRS

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I paid 30% more to get all chrome. I got a cheaper version.
customer_reviews.author: Charnsit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used this bar 5 times in the last year and it just snapped while removing lug nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cal Hawk 25" Breaker Bar.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid bar. Cant beat the quality of this breaker bar for the price. Also like said above. It can be used as a great weapon to. It has replaced my Louisville Slugger in my car. Very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff SmokeyBones O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy breaker bar. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: msaint

customer_reviews.title: Great Breaker Bar for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Best $20 purchase. This easily broke loose every lug nut that had been put on way too tight at the dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: It ha the balls to crack tight nuts.
customer_reviews.text: Good breaker bar. Only suggestion would be some knurling on the hand grip to prevent your hands slipping in wet, oily, sweaty conditions like I see here in Texas!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Everything I'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: It's a commodity product, but well-made and finished, solid in the hand. Price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Millett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tool looked good and price was right. haven't put it to the test yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is worth its weight in gold. I am in charge of fixing 65 cars for my church and I use it for removing luge nuts when I change wheels. I guess it is the opposite of a long torque wrench for me. I have used it for removing super-tight oil filter housing caps as well. It is strong and well made. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: docster6

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for this price. Having a rubberized grip would be better, but this would increase the cost. Using a work glove will improve gripping ability on a hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Cromwell133

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I have used it several times and it has stood up to the heavy stress.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, great leverage, much better than my cheap existing breaker bar
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Flahiff

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a nice sturdy tool
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice sturdy tool. It will be replacing my factory lug wrench that bent and left me waiting for help while changing a flat tire.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tool worked great to remove crown nut 25" is a lot of leverage I would recommend this to any back yard mechanic
customer_reviews.author: RadioGuy70

customer_reviews.title: Nice chrome finish
customer_reviews.text: Nice chrome finish, except for the black swivel head. The Picture looks like the entire wrench is chrome plated, which is wrong. It appears as though the black swivel head came from a different place (mfg) and was added later. I have yet to put some real torque on it for a good test, but it is long enough to just be a nasty weapon if the swivel head breaks off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Broke loose some stubborn trailer hitch bolts like they were nothing. Would buy again but it will probably last forever so hopefully I won't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be great quality. You will have NO PROBLEM removing lug ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be great quality. You will have NO PROBLEM removing lug nuts or other bolts with this breaker bar. The leverage it gives you can tackle the toughest jobs. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The Irish Riot

customer_reviews.title: seem sturdy works good
customer_reviews.text: this worked great loosening the compensator bolt on my 08 Harley Ultra Classic
customer_reviews.author: Randy U,

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this breaker bar for 2 years now. I got a car and a truck and occasionally worked on some friends cars.There isn't a nut yet it hasn't been able to break. Of all my tools I can honestly say this one is my favorite. It hasn't bend one bit and keeps up breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Cal Hawk Tools 1/2" Drive Heavy-Duty Breaker Bar, ASPBB425
product_meta.description: Model:ASPBB425Cal Hawk Tools ASPBB425 1/2" Drive Heavy-Duty Breaker Bar is a great addition for your home tool box.
feature_bullets: Drop forged, heat treated steel construction
Full polished and chrome plated for durability
Cushioned rubber grip handle for a comfortable hold
